long_description: Cover ground quickly in the backcountry or blast through a bushwhack approach with the Outdoor Research Verglas gaiters. They are designed to move fast and carry light in the mountains. Ultralight, waterproof and breathable 3-layer Pertex(R) Shield nylon ripstop upper sections offer maximum breathability. Rugged 500-denier Cordura(R) nylon lower sections resist snow and rain while offering excellent durability where you need it most. Cordura nylon sections rise higher on inside of ankles for best protection. Low-profile leg shape reduces snagging; tapers slightly at ankles for a sleek fit. Asymmetric-shaped bottom edges are curved to fit boots evenly with no gaps, keeping dirt, twigs, scree and snow out of boots. Easy-access rip-and-stick closures open in front for quick on/off plus they can be adjusted for a custom fit. Tops feature comfortable 3/4-inch nylon webbing straps with low-profile cam buckles to keep gaiters from slipping down legs. Outdoor Research Verglas gaiters have double-riveted boot lace hooks to grab laces, helping keep gaiters in place. Hypalon(R) instep straps offer excellent durability and easy adjustment; loops above buckles keep strap end from flapping.
